Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26291 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.5.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-26291 affecting package javapackages-bootstrap for versions less than 1.5.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package javapackages-bootstrap is earlier than 1.5.0-6, affected by CVE-2021-26291
